parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. You can specify up to 100 domain names in each call. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description:
The name of the Internet service provider (ISP).

You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation to query the most recent region list. If you do not set this parameter, all regions are queried.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description:
The name of the region.

You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation to query the most recent region list. If you do not set this parameter, all regions are queried.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
